name: incident-response
description: Production incident response with investigation, fix, and postmortem agents

agents.name: investigator
agents.role: Trace logs, metrics, and error paths to identify root cause. Narrow the blast radius.

agents.name: fixer
agents.role: Implement minimal hotfix with smallest possible blast radius. Prioritize speed and safety.

agents.name: postmortem
agents.role: Write incident report, create follow-up issues, add monitoring and alerting to prevent recurrence
